item.title: 马来西亚立法者批准扩大互联网控制的法案
item.description: 马来西亚立法者投票赞成扩大政府对互联网的控制，对法律可能压制异议和言论自由的批评不为所动。【原文：Malaysian lawmakers voted in favor of broadening the government’s control over the internet, unmoved by criticism that the law risks suppressing dissent and free speech.】

item.title: 据说星展银行和日本顶级贷款机构是巴宁银行的竞标者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）、三菱UFJ金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）和三井住友金融集团公司（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）在内的亚洲银行都是印尼泛亚银行的潜在收购者。【原文：Asian banks including DBS Group Holdings Ltd., Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. are among potential suitors for PT Bank Pan Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拓普康获得 KKR 和 EQT 的收购出价，日本并购案升温
item.description: 拓普康公司正在权衡包括 KKR & Co. 和 EQT AB 在内的收购者的出价，这是日本收购活动不断升级的最新迹象。【原文：Topcon Corp. is weighing takeover bids from suitors including KKR & Co. and EQT AB, the latest sign of escalating buyout activity in Japan.】

item.title: 全球投资者一周内抢购 30 亿美元印度股票
item.description: 在印度股市大幅下挫之后，外国资金正在重返印度股市，因为市场对降息越来越乐观。【原文：Foreign funds are returning to the Indian stock market after a massive selloff, amid growing optimism over interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易员认为中国收益率将跌至 1.5%，一切反弹希望渺茫
item.description: 中国明年将转向更宽松的货币政策，这刺激了对中国主权债务收益率将从历史低点进一步下滑的看涨押注。【原文：China’s shift toward a looser monetary policy next year is spurring bullish bets that yields on its sovereign debt will further tumble from record lows.】

item.title: 高层领导发出加大刺激力度的信号后中国股市反弹
item.description: 中国最高领导人做出了多年来最强有力的振兴经济增长的承诺后，中国股市周二跳涨。【原文：Chinese shares jumped Tuesday after the country’s top leaders made their strongest pledge in years to revive economic growth.】

item.title: 小米预告夏季将推出类似特斯拉的 SUV，大力拓展电动汽车市场
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）展示了一款新型 SUV，该公司计划在 2025 年夏季左右销售这款 SUV，并加大力度在全球最大的电动汽车领域与特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp. showed off a new SUV it plans to sell around the summer of 2025, intensifying an effort to take on Tesla Inc. and BYD Co. in the world’s biggest electric vehicle arena.】

item.title: 阿波罗首席执行官动用现金购买 4.31 亿美元股份，最终可能出售
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）正在抛售 4.31 亿美元的公司股票，并可能最终出售这些股票，因为他希望获得与该公司相关的部分财富。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan is putting up $431 million of the company’s stock, and could end up selling it, as he looks to access some of his wealth tied to the firm.】

item.title: 韩国股票在政治危机中损失 1000 亿美元后上涨
item.description: 韩国股市周二上涨，自上周短暂的戒严令使该国陷入政治动荡以来首次实现单日上涨。【原文：South Korean equities rose on Tuesday, seeking their first daily advance since last week’s short-lived martial law thrust the country into political turmoil.】

item.title: 澳大利亚商业信心下滑，经济前景不容乐观
item.description: 澳大利亚 11 月份的商业信心急剧下降，衡量就业、销售和盈利能力的指标进一步疲软，这再次表明私营经济正面临巨大压力。【原文：Australia’s business confidence fell sharply in November and conditions, which measure jobs, sales and profitability, softened further in another sign that the private sector of the economy is under heavy pressure.】

item.title: 信实工业寻求多达 30 亿美元的再融资贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）正在与银行谈判，以获得多达 30 亿美元的贷款，为明年到期的债务进行再融资。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries is in talks with banks for a loan of as much as $3 billion to refinance debt due next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国数据或影响美联储利率走势，黄金在此之前保持升势
item.description: 黄金在上涨后趋于稳定，因为交易商将焦点转向了本周将发布的关键性美国通胀报告，这些报告可能会在美联储今年最后一次利率决议前左右市场预期。【原文：Gold steadied after an advance as traders shifted focus to key US inflation reports due this week that may shape expectations ahead of the Federal Reserve’s final interest-rate decision of the year.】

item.title: 人工智能盈利的秘诀是雇佣更多博士
item.description:
从发现棉田中的杂草到扫描灌木丛以寻找偷猎者的踪迹，人工智能初创公司正在招募数十名专家来完成高度专业化的任务。【原文：

From spotting weeds in cotton fields to scanning the bush for signs of poachers, AI startups are recruiting scores of experts for highly specialized tasks.

】

item.title: 比特币摇摆不定，小型代币下挫，加密货币涨势岌岌可危
item.description: 随着当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币行业的支持所引发的乐观情绪开始降温，加密货币遭遇了一波抛售潮。【原文：A bout of selling buffeted crypto as the optimism sparked by President-elect Donald Trump’s embrace of the sector begins to cool.】

item.title: 阿克曼基金会持有的 X 公司股份在 23 年贬值过半
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的基金会购买了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 的股份，但一份新的报税文件显示，截至去年年底，该基金会的投资价值下降了一半以上。【原文：Bill Ackman’s foundation, which bought a stake in Elon Musk’s social-media platform X, reported the value of its investment dropped by more than half as of the end of last year, a new tax filing shows.】

item.title: 交易商权衡中国刺激政策和叙利亚动荡局势，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 投资者权衡中国明年采取更大胆刺激措施的前景，同时市场关注叙利亚政权垮台的余波，因此石油价格保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady as investors weighed the prospect for bolder Chinese stimulus next year, while the market monitored the fallout from the collapse of the Syrian regime.】

item.title: 印度基金增持珠宝和电子产品制造商股票，涨幅达 63
item.description: 印度 Motilal Oswal 资产管理公司预计，印度对自由支配商品的贪得无厌以及政府对扩大制造业的推动将刺激相关股票的下一轮反弹。【原文：India’s Motilal Oswal Asset Management Co. is expecting the country’s insatiable appetite for discretionary goods and the government’s push to expand manufacturing to spur the next leg of a rally in related shares.】

item.title: 因严重干旱，Volcafe 下调巴西阿拉比卡咖啡前景展望
item.description: 世界最大的咖啡贸易商之一 Volcafe Ltd. 在一次作物考察中发现，世界第一大咖啡种植国巴西的长期干旱十分严重，因此该公司下调了对巴西阿拉比卡咖啡产量的展望。【原文：Volcafe Ltd., one of the world’s biggest coffee traders, cut its outlook for Brazil’s arabica production after a crop tour revealed the severity of an extended drought in the world’s top grower.】

item.title: 香港股市因中国刺激经济信号而飙升：市场综述
item.description: 在中国最高领导人使用了多年来最直接的刺激语言之后，香港股市有望引领亚洲股市走高。【原文：Stocks in Hong Kong are poised to lead Asian equities higher after China’s top leaders used their most direct language on stimulus in years.】

item.title: 里夫斯要求部长们在紧缩开支审查中寻求节约
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）要求大臣们设法节省部门预算，因为基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的政府正努力在财政困难的背景下就公共支出做出艰难的选择。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves has told ministers to seek savings in their departmental budgets, as Keir Starmer’s government grapples with tough choices on public spending against the backdrop of a difficult fiscal picture.】

item.title: 英国企业呼吁在关税威胁下参与贸易谈判
item.description: 由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普所倡导的保护主义使出口商陷入不确定性，英国企业正在寻求更多地参与贸易政策的制定。【原文：UK businesses are seeking greater involvement in formulating trade policy, as the protectionism advocated by US President-elect Donald Trump plunges exporters into uncertainty.】

item.title: 简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）在花旗关键之年来临之前击退质疑者
item.description:
在银行经历了艰难的考验和重大变革之后，首席执行官表示回报即将到来

After a tough stint and major changes at the bank, the CEO says the payoff is coming

】

item.title: 中国彩妆大亨在香港上市，跻身亿万富翁行列
item.description: 毛戈平是中国最著名的化妆师之一，他的美容公司在香港上市，结束了其辉煌的发展历程，这位前歌剧演员的高档粉饼和乳液打破了中国消费放缓的局面。【原文：One of China’s best known makeup artists, Mao Geping, took his beauty company public in Hong Kong, capping a remarkable run that’s seen the former opera performer’s premium powders and lotions defy the nation’s consumer slowdown.】

item.title: C3.ai 因销售强劲而大涨，并上调全年收入展望
item.description: 数据分析软件公司 C3.ai Inc. 公布季度营收超过预期，并上调了全年销售预期，在盘后交易中上涨约 13%。【原文：C3.ai Inc., a data-analysis software company, gained about 13% in extended trading after reporting quarterly revenue that topped estimates and raising its full-year sales forecast.】

item.title: 托尔兄弟公司订单增加，但利润率预测令人失望
item.description: 托尔兄弟公司（Toll Brothers Inc.【原文：Toll Brothers Inc. beat expectations for quarterly home orders as the strong stock market provided a lift to the luxury builder’s wealthy buyers, but a profit-margin projection fell short of estimates.】

item.title: 保尔森支持的 Perpetua 公司达成锑协议以削弱中国禁令的影响
item.description: 约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）支持的 Perpetua Resources 公司已同意与阳光银矿精炼有限公司（Sunshine Silver Mining & Refining Co.【原文：John Paulson-backed Perpetua Resources Corp. has agreed to work with Sunshine Silver Mining & Refining Co. to find ways within the US to process antimony, one of the critical minerals under China’s export ban.】

item.title: 甲骨文增长乏力，云计算部门热情受挫
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）公布的季度营收符合预期，令投资者大失所望。该股在延时交易中下跌了约 8%。【原文：Oracle Corp. reported quarterly revenue in line with estimates, disappointing investors who have boosted the stock by 81% this year on enthusiasm for Oracle’s ascendant cloud business. The shares fell about 8% in extended trading.】

item.title: ICE 限制基因编辑糖在美国流通的举措可能会损害巴西糖业的发展
item.description: 洲际交易所限制转基因蔗糖交割的新规定可能会限制巴西蔗糖向美国的供应。【原文：A new Intercontinental Exchange rule restricting the delivery of genetically modified cane sugar could restrict the flow of Brazilian supplies to the US.】

item.title: 波多黎各调解员警告称公用事业债务问题的解决 "遥遥无期
item.description: 一个调解小组警告美国地区法官劳拉-泰勒-斯温（Laura Taylor Swain），如何以最佳方式减少波多黎各电力公司的债务，目前仍没有明确的途径。【原文：There remains no clear path on how to best reduce the debt of Puerto Rico’s power utility, a mediation team warned US District Judge Laura Taylor Swain, who is overseeing the seven-year bankruptcy.】

item.title: 亿万富翁鲁特菲的火爆上市事关接班人问题
item.description: 快时尚连锁店 Groupe Dynamite Inc. 背后的零售企业家表示，他在与私募股权投资集团洽谈后发现他们并不合适，因此决定将公司上市。【原文：The retail entrepreneur behind fast-fashion chain Groupe Dynamite Inc. says he decided to take the company public after exploring talks with private equity groups and determining they weren’t the right fit.】
